name: Qwyllion
resist: acid, cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
languages: Common, Goblin, Infernal, Sylvan, Void Speech

trait.name: Disruptive
text: Because of the qwyllion's nauseating nature, spellcasters have disadvantage on concentration checks while within 40 feet of the qwyllion.

trait.name: Nauseating Aura
text: The qwyllion is nauseatingly corrupt. Any creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the qwyllion must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1d8 rounds. If a creature that's already poisoned by this effect fails the saving throw again, it becomes incapacitated instead, and a creature already incapacitated by the qwyllion drops to 0 hit points if it fails the saving throw. A successful saving throw renders a creature immune to the effect for 24 hours. Creatures dominated by the qwyllion are immune to this effect.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The qwyllion uses its deadly gaze if it can, and makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (3d12 + 5) slashing damage.

action.name: Deadly Gaze (recharge 5-6)
text: The qwyllion turns its gaze against a single creature within 20 feet of the qwyllion. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take 16 (3d8 + 3) necrotic damage and be incapacitated until the start of the qwyllion's next turn. A humanoid slain by a qwyllion's death gaze rises 2d4 hours later as a specter under the qwyllion's control.
